thread.title: The Popular Nike Special Field Air Force 1 Launches In Four New Colorways
thread.title_full: The Popular Nike Special Field Air Force 1 Launches In Four New Colorways

author: David Fischer
title: The Popular Nike Special Field Air Force 1 Launches In Four New Colorways
text:
Visit the original post to see all 9 images from this gallery. 
Since its hardcourt debut in 1982, the Air Force 1 has transcended the game of basketball to become an icon of sneaker style. Built today for tomorrow, the Special Field Air Force 1 is the new Force of the future. The latest iteration of the iconic AF1 first launched late last year and quickly made a dent in the market. As such it comes with little surprise that Nike continues to build on the silhouette with new colorways and material combinations.
The military-inspired SF AF-1 blends a ripstop ballistic nylon upper, removable dual ankle straps, and a hidden Espionage Pocket in the tongue to deliver unmatched urban utility and versatility. For Spring 2017 the Nike Special Field Air Force 1 comes in four new colorways: black, dark navy, off-white and desert. Look out for a release from select retailers come January 19.
